description: Connect with SimpliRoute, the last-mile delivery optimization platform. Manage clients, vehicles, visits, routes, and optimize your delivery operations.

actions.name: get_fleets
actions.description: Retrieve the list of fleets available in the account.

actions.name: get_zones
actions.description: Retrieve the list of zones available in the account.

actions.name: get_observations
actions.description: Retrieve the list of observations available in the account.

actions.name: get_skills
actions.description: Retrieve the list of skills available in the account.

actions.name: get_sellers
actions.description: Retrieve the list of sellers available in the account.

actions.name: get_tags
actions.description: Retrieve the list of tags available in the account.

actions.name: update_visit
actions.description: Completely update an existing visit with all fields.

actions.name: delete_visit
actions.description: Delete a visit by its ID.

actions.name: get_visit_detail
actions.description: Get detailed information about a specific visit.

actions.name: create_visits
actions.description: Create visits. Multiple visits can be created in a single request.

actions.name: get_visits
actions.description: Retrieve all registered visits. Can be filtered by planned visit date.

actions.name: get_visit
actions.description: Retrieve details of a specific visit by ID.

actions.name: add_visit_items
actions.description: Add items to an existing visit.

actions.name: update_visit_partial
actions.description: Partially update fields of an existing visit.

actions.name: get_plans
actions.description: Retrieve the list of saved routing plans (executions).

actions.name: get_plan_vehicles
actions.display_name: Get vehicles with routes on date
actions.description: Returns the vehicles that have planned routes on the indicated date.

actions.name: create_plan
actions.description: Create an empty plan (execution) without routes (reserve a planning day).

actions.name: get_me
actions.description: Returns account information of the authenticated user via API token.

actions.name: create_vehicle
actions.description: Register a new vehicle in the account.

actions.name: delete_vehicle
actions.description: Delete a vehicle by its ID.

actions.name: get_vehicles
actions.description: Retrieve the list of vehicles registered in the account.

actions.name: get_vehicle
actions.description: Retrieve information of a specific vehicle.

actions.name: create_client_property
actions.description: Create a new custom attribute for clients.

actions.name: get_clients
actions.description: Retrieves the list of clients associated with the account. Can filter by client key.

actions.name: create_clients
actions.description: Create one or multiple new clients in the account.

actions.name: bulk_delete_clients
actions.description: Delete multiple clients in a single call.

actions.name: delete_route
actions.description: Delete a route by its ID.

actions.name: create_route
actions.description: Create a new route manually by assigning vehicle, driver and date.

actions.name: get_routes
actions.description: Retrieve the list of existing routes.

actions.name: get_route
actions.description: Retrieve details of a specific route.

actions.name: create_users
actions.description: Create new user/driver in the account.

actions.name: update_user
actions.description: Update information of an existing user.

actions.name: get_user
actions.description: Retrieve information of a specific user by ID.

actions.name: get_drivers
actions.description: Retrieve the list of drivers registered in the account.

actions.name: custom_api_call
actions.description: Make a custom API call
